## hpr0798 :: The IBM Model M Keyboard

 
In this exciting adventure Germ talks about the wonders of the best keyboard ever produced.

Links

Unicomp       : https://pckeyboards.stores.yahoo.net/
Linux Variant : https://pckeyboards.stores.yahoo.net/linux101.html

Other Keyboards Worth Mentioning:

Das Keyboard  : https://www.daskeyboard.com/
Cherry        : https://www.cherrycorp.com/english/keyboards/index.htm
Happy Hacking : https://elitekeyboards.com/products.php?sub=pfu_keyboards,hhkbpro2&pid=pdkb400b
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Happy_Hacking_Keyboard
